quote_first: The three of us mooched about the office, making aimless conversation, glacing with studied carelessness into the front street, whistling little tunes to ourselves. By
title: All Things Bright and Beautiful
author: James Herriot

quote_first: Gary shut himself inside his office and flipped through the messages. Caroline had called at 1:35, 1:40, 1:50, 1:55, and 2:10; it was now
quote_last: . He pumped his fist in triumph. Finally, finally, some evidence of desperation.
title: The Corrections
author: Jonathan Franzen
